DOC.detailed_description: Schizophrenic inpatient examine shortly admission broad battery clinical neurological rating scale neuropsychological test . They randomize either standard treatment ( include antipsychotic medication , art occupational therapy , psychotherapy ) standard treatment plus daily computerbased cognitive training ( COGPACK ; ten 1-hour session two week ) . After repetition broad assessment battery patient ( family member ) take part bifocal psychoeducation group program ( eight 1-hour session four week ) . Specific pre-post measure illness knowledge , self expert rating adherence treatment , insight illness , treatment satisfaction . The study also include 9-month follow-up , number rehospitalizations , day hospital psychopathology primary outcome measure .
